name: photo-of-the-day-november-13-2008
title: Photo Of The Day: November 13, 2008
author: Christy Frink
excerpt: We’re not sure why the Parthenon is lit up green at this time of year (is it Christmas already?), but we think it looks pretty eerie. Thanks to macintheus for the submission! Photo Of The Day will be a recurring feature for Nashvillest as long you keep giving us stuff to post. Don’t worry–we’ll give you props. Just add them to the pool or tag them with “Nashvillest” if you’re feeling lazy.
contentEncoded:
We’re not sure why the Parthenon is lit up green at this time of year (is it Christmas already?), but we think it looks pretty eerie. Thanks to macintheus for the submission!

Photo Of The Day will be a recurring feature for Nashvillest as long you keep giving us stuff to post. Don’t worry–we’ll give you props. Just add them to the pool or tag them with “Nashvillest” if you’re feeling lazy.
